message: Bob, I'm offering you a chance to acquire a highly valuable product. I'm confident it has the potential to be a game-changer for your business. My initial offer is $2000000. Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to stay closer to my desired price point to make this work.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go lower than $1750000. Let me know if that's something you can work with.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to counter with an offer of $1600000. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests.
